title: Can't We Just All Get Along
itunes:title: Can't We Just All Get Along
description:
Thursday 1/5- Today political commentator from CNN Angela Rye stopped in and gave her thoughts about the controversy she had with TSA workers and the violence in Chicago, and what a coincidence because Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to four people who committed a violent act in Chicago. He also awarded a cop who slammed a 15 year old girl in school. Also, Angela Yee helped out some listeners with their issues for Ask Yee, one caller dealing with someone on the down low and another who can possibly be the baby daddy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
